column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////We were visiting Chicago and wanted to try this place but it was completely booked
column2: but they're willing to put you on a waitlist if you show up in person. While we waited for a table
column3: multiple staff checked in on us and worked hard to get us a table. After one drink at the bar
column4: we had one! The aged ribeye steak was cooked perfectly and the truffle Mac and Cheese was delicious!! We had the chocolate cream pie for desert and it didn't disappoint. It's a must try if you love chocolate. Overall we had an excellent experience here and would recommend it to anyone.
